title: Guitar Lessons & Packages
subtitle: Choose the learning path that works best for your goals and schedule
description: Whether you're taking your first steps or looking to refine your improvisation skills, these packages are designed to meet you where you are and guide you to where you want to be.

packages.name: Single Lesson
packages.description: Perfect for trying out my teaching style or addressing specific musical challenges.
features: Personalized assessment of your current level
Customized lesson plan based on your goals
Practice materials and exercises to take home
Option for in-person or online delivery

packages.name: Foundation Package
packages.description: Build solid foundations with consistent weekly lessons. Ideal for establishing good practice habits and seeing meaningful progress.
features: Comprehensive skills assessment and goal planning
Structured curriculum tailored to your learning style
Expanded practice materials and backing tracks
included: Flexible rescheduling within the package period

packages.name: Transformation Intensive
packages.description: The most comprehensive package for serious students. Experience significant improvement in technique, theory, and expressive improvisation.
features: Deep-dive assessment and long-term goal planning
Advanced curriculum with multiple musical styles
Bi-weekly progress reviews and curriculum adjustments
Extensive library of practice materials and backing tracks
included: Extensive practice materials and backing track library
Optional mid-point mini-recital or jam session
Free 30-minute follow-up session 4 weeks after completion

additionalInfo.cancellationPolicy: 24 hours notice required for cancellations. Less than 24 hours notice may result in full session charge.
additionalInfo.reschedulePolicy: Free rescheduling with 24+ hours notice. Package students get flexible rescheduling throughout their package period.

trialLesson.description: A shorter introductory lesson to experience my teaching style and discuss your goals

payment: Payment due at time of booking for single lessons
Package payments due before first lesson
Bank transfer, PayPal, and credit card accepted
attendance: Students are expected to attend scheduled lessons
Late arrivals may result in shortened lesson time
Consistent attendance leads to better progress
refund: Single lessons: No refunds within 24 hours of lesson time
Packages: Refunds available for unused lessons with 48 hours notice
Emergency situations considered case by case
